snippet.title: Combustion - Realms Deep 2023 Trailer
snippet.description:
From the bygone days of 1997, Combustion is a dieselpunk Action RPG inspired by classics of the PSX-era. As rookie cop Calico, you must restore order as a mastermind serial-killer sends a wave of terror across the city.

Combustion still needs some time in the oven, but we wanted to use this opportunity to give you a bit of a sneak peek at what's to come. 

- Wishlist Combustion here: https://3drealms.live/COMBUSTION
- Follow 3D Realms on Twitter: https://3drealms.live/3DRSocial
- Join the 3D Realms Discord: https://3drealms.live/Discord
- Join the 3D Realms Subreddit: https://3drealms.live/Reddit
- https://3drealms.com/
- http://slipgate-ironworks.com
